title: PBE issues
body: Can someone help? when i tryed to open my pbe it didnt open like at all and if i try to go to the folder and open the admin one it still doesnt work. so i re downloaded it and decided to change my name and it restarted  as usual and then it didnt open again and i tryed to open it from another previous pbe folder and it restarted the WHOLE download thing and if i log off it will make me restart the WHOLE download because no matter what i do the pbe just WONT open  and i cant do anything like run as administrator or open it from the folder, i think its bugged with winrar when you download it because it makes you extract folders to a specific place but if there is a solution please help

replies.body: When you are extracting your PBE client, make sure that it's being sent to a location that's inaccessible.  Otherwise, the patcher won't be able to launch or scan files properly!  You can also try our [Permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide, to make sure your settings are configured to allow access.  I hope that helps!
